text: Mad Atom is a game development studio founded in October 2011. It is located in Brighton, United Kingdom. Ex-employees of Disney's Black Rock Studio founded Mad Atom in June 2011. Monkey Slam was the studio's first title. It was released on 6 September 2012 on iOS and published by Chillingo. Mad Atom worked with Boss Alien for creating the Mac version of CSR Racing. CSR Classics released in October 2013 on iOS and was developed by Boss Alien and published by NaturalMotion Games. CSR Classics has similar game mechanics to its sister title, but has classic race cars from the 1950s to the 1970s. Company stopped to work in 2019. == References == Category:Video game companies of the United Kingdom
